*******  int. the boys room - later night the boy lays in his bed. blue and black stripes from the shades fold over his face. he can hear raccoons scurrying outside he sees a spider in the corner of the room. just sitting in its web 94 the boy doesnt particularly like or dislike spiders. theyre everywhere in the house. its a big house and its right next to a reserve. but something about this spider sitting there...it really bothers him. it makes him mad. he can hear the spider. just sitting there. getting louder im going to describe it as emotional tinnitus: when everything is silent and quiet you can see the empty web youre in. it is annoying. which is the slowest form of torture ...the boy gets up  cut to:int. car - night the boy drives. im not sure where hes driving. hes not sure where hes driving he drives about an hour out into some industrial wasteland-looking nook of los angeles he parks his car
